channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Exclusive discounts from CBS Mornings Deals
item.description: On this edition of CBS Mornings Deals, we show you items that might just become essentials in your everyday life. Visit cbsdeals.com to take advantage...

item.title: Israelis hold a mass funeral for Shiri Bibas and her two sons killed in Gaza
item.description: Crowds gathered in Israel for the funeral procession of the Bibas family, a mother and two young sons killed while being held hostage in Gaza. The sto...

item.title: Romanian far-right candidate for presidency taken for questioning
item.description: Prosecutors are investigating alleged campaign fraud, after Georgescu came from nowhere to win the first round.

item.title: Trump to hold first Cabinet meeting, with Musk in attendance
item.description: President Trump is holding his first Cabinet meeting at the White House on Wednesday, with his Cabinet nominees largely confirmed.

item.title: For Women's History Month, NPR wants to know who has made an impact in your life
item.description: Is there a woman who has impacted your life in a profound way? NPR wants to hear your story.

item.title: Southwest Airlines flight abruptly rises to avoid another plane crossing Chicago runway
House Democrat introduces bill to reinstate veterans fired from the federal government under Trump
item.description: A freshman Democratic congressman is introducing a bill to protect the jobs of veterans working for the government amid mass firings by the Trump admi...

item.title: The House passed a budget resolution. What's next? And, a tactic to decrease bird flu
item.description: House Republicans rallied together yesterday to pass multitrillion-dollar plan to address defense, immigration and more. And, why farmers don't like t...

item.title: Ukraine PM says minerals deal agreed with US
item.description: Denis Shmyhal said the Ukrainian government would not sign a deal without security guarantees.

item.title: What we know about US-Ukraine minerals deal
item.description: A Ukrainian official says Kyiv has agreed to the terms of a deal which would give the US access to mineral deposits.

item.title: Behind the scenes with the best actor nominees for the 2025 Oscars
item.description: Watch scenes from the performances nominated for best actor at the 97th annual Academy Awards, as well as interviews with the nominees. The 2025 Oscar...

item.title: Elon Musk appears to be driving Europe away from Teslas
item.description: Overall EV sales in Europe surged 34% in January, while Tesla saw its sales across the continent plummet by a staggering 45%.

item.title: Chile power cut: 'We were trapped like sardines in the dark'
item.description: Millions of people in Chile had their routines disrupted by an almost nationwide power cut.

item.title: Meet the 'wooly devil,' a new plant species discovered in Big Bend National Park
item.description: The plant, formally known as Ovicula biradiata , is especially notable for being the simultaneous discovery of a new species and genus. It was found w...

item.title: Veteran journalist Don Dahler reflects on a life covering the world's biggest stories
item.description: In his new memoir, "Souvenirs from an Absurd Life," Don Dahler shares firsthand accounts of war zones, wildlife and decades of groundbreaking reportin...

item.title: Christianity declines among U.S. adults while "religiously unaffiliated" grows, study says
item.description: The percentage of Christians in the U.S. has dropped dramatically, though that loss may have leveled off in recent years.

item.title: UK suspension of aid is 'punitive', Rwanda says
item.description: The UK says it is halting aid to Rwanda as a result of its support for the M23, a notorious rebel group.
